translation.en: High winds broke a wire just down the street.
- Someone will fix it. - Tomorrow. Not on the Sabbath!
translation.es: - Lo van a arreglar. - Mañana, no en sabbat.

translation.en: I can't go to my mother's for lunch!
translation.es: No podré almorzar en la casa de mamá.

translation.en: And I have an excuse to avoid my mother- in- law!
translation.es: Y yo tengo una excusa para no ver a mi suegra.

translation.en: You know, Esty's not trapped like we are! She doesn't have a baby to carry.
translation.es: Esty no está atrapada como nosotras. No tiene un bebé.

translation.en: Good point! Just leave your bag upstairs.
- Where are you going? - To my parents- in- law. For lunch.
translation.es: - ¿Adónde vas? - A almorzar a la casa de mis suegros.

translation.en: She wasn't sick when I left this morning.
It's always something with Esty, isn't it?
- Thank you for helping me. - Of course!
Go the long way around Williamsburg, please.
translation.es: Tome el camino largo, por Williamsburg.

translation.en: Yanky, shouldn't you be at the synagogue?
translation.es: Yanky, deberías estar en la sinagoga.

translation.en: She wasn't home after lunch yesterday
translation.es: Ayer no estaba en casa después del almuerzo,

translation.en: and she never came home last night.
- Let's head over together. - Esty's missing.
- Where would she go? - That's the question!
translation.es: - ¿Adónde habrá ido? - Esa es la pregunta.

translation.en: Has she been in an accident?
That girl was never good enough for you!
- Mimi! - She was trouble from the start.

translation.es: No tenía mamá, su padre era raro...

translation.en: A year of marriage and not even a baby!
translation.es: ¡Un año de matrimonio y ni siquiera un bebé!

translation.en: We shouldn't have agreed to the match.
translation.es: No debimos haber aceptado que se casaran.
A mi papá le encantaba esta canción.

translation.en: He had a wonderful voice, Esty.
translation.es: Él tenía una voz maravillosa, Esty.

translation.en: All the men in his family did.
translation.es: También todos los hombres de su familia.

translation.en: But soon you'll have children of your own.
translation.es: Pero pronto tendrás tus propios hijos.

translation.en: - Grandpa will be home any minute. - He's not here yet!
translation.es: - Ya va a llegar el abuelo. - Aún no llegó.

translation.en: So he'll hear women singing when he arrives? No.
translation.es: ¿Va a escuchar a las mujeres cantando al llegar?
- Las píldoras de la abuela. - Gracias.

translation.en: The Shapiros near the Navy Yard.
- From the jewelry business? - Yes. The brothers.
translation.es: - ¿Los de la joyería? - Sí, los hermanos.

translation.en: But the father has never worked.
- He sits and studies! - That's good!
translation.es: - Se sienta a estudiar. - ¡Eso es bueno!

translation.en: - What's the boy like? - What's the boy like?
translation.es: - ¿Cómo es el chico? - ¿Cómo es el chico?

translation.en: Your marriage will mark the beginning of a new life!
translation.es: tu matrimonio marcará el comienzo de una nueva vida.

translation.en: Let's wait till the Shapiros agree to the match, alright?
translation.es: Esperemos a que los Shapiro estén de acuerdo con el matrimonio.

translation.en: After all, Esty is an orphan.
You're not staying for the meal?

translation.es: El de fresa es mi favorito. Gracias.

translation.en: Tell us everything about your wife, Yanky.
translation.es: Cuéntanos todo sobre tu esposa, Yanky.

translation.en: I'm in Manhattan during the day.
translation.es: Estoy en Manhattan todo el día.

translation.en: I work with my brothers in the business now.
translation.es: Trabajo con mis hermanos en el negocio.

translation.en: Esty does what all the other wives do.
translation.es: Esty hace lo mismo que las demás esposas:

translation.en: She shops, she cooks, she visits her grandmother...
translation.es: va de compras, cocina, visita a su abuela...

translation.en: Esty isn't like the other wives.
translation.es: Esty no es como las otras esposas.

translation.en: Yanky, come on! She doesn't even visit with them.
You have no idea how Esty spends the day.
translation.es: No sabes qué hace durante el día.

translation.en: Gentlemen. The point is, we can't have our people losing their way.
translation.es: Señores, el asunto es que no podemos dejar que nuestra gente pierda el rumbo.

translation.en: We need to find this young woman and bring her back to her husband!
translation.es: Tenemos que encontrar a esa joven y regresarla con su marido.

translation.en: - I've asked your cousin Moishe to help. - Moishe?
translation.es: - Le pedí ayuda a tu primo Moishe. - ¿A Moishe?

translation.en: The rabbi understands that Moishe has his own problems, right?
translation.es: El rabino sabe que Moishe tiene sus propios problemas, ¿verdad?

translation.en: Not to mention, in his marriage.
translation.es: Uno de ellos es su matrimonio.

translation.en: A Jew, though he sinned, is still a Jew.
translation.es: Un judío, aunque peque, sigue siendo judío.
Hasta hace poco, Moishe no era...

translation.en: Moishe is the one to find your son's wife.
translation.es: Moishe encontrará a la esposa de tu hijo.

translation.en: How far can she possibly have gone?
Miriam Shapiro wants to see you.
How will I know which one she is?
Now walk as if you're looking for something. With a smile.
translation.es: Camina como si buscaras algo, y sonríe.

translation.en: Would you like to see a menu?
- No, I meant the coffee, actually. - Oh.
You have a lot of friends.
Yeah. A lot of tired friends.
- That will be two euros, twenty. - Yes.
- Here we are. Coffee! - Oh, nice!
- They're all the same. - Thanks. You're so sweet.
translation.es: - Son todos iguales. - Gracias. Qué amable eres.

translation.en: - We'll start in a minute. - OK, I'm coming.
translation.es: - Ya vamos a empezar. - Ya voy.

translation.en: We have to bring these inside, because we have a rehearsal now.
translation.es: Tenemos que llevarlos adentro, porque tenemos ensayo.

translation.en: - See you around. - See you around, Esty.
I'm assuming you all stayed in last night and practiced your parts?
translation.es: Supongo que anoche se quedaron y practicaron sus partes.

translation.en: Can anyone think of a better way to spend a Saturday evening in Berlin?
translation.es: No hay mejor forma de pasar un sábado a la noche en Berlín.

translation.en: Let's start from the trio of the second movement.
translation.es: Empecemos desde el trío del segundo movimiento.

translation.en: Peace be upon you! How do you do?
translation.es: - La paz sea contigo. Mucho gusto. - Mucho gusto.

translation.en: Don't forget, Esty. He speaks first.
translation.es: Esty, no olvides que él habla primero.

translation.en: My father took me and my brothers to Europe last spring.
translation.es: Mi padre nos llevó a mí y a mis hermanos a Europa la primavera pasada.

translation.en: We visited the graves of all the famous rabbis.
translation.es: Visitamos las tumbas de todos los rabinos famosos.

translation.en: You went all the way to Europe and all you saw were graves?
translation.es: ¿Viajaste hasta Europa solo para ver tumbas?

translation.en: but my father didn't allow it.
translation.es: pero mi padre no lo permitió.

translation.en: I want to go back someday.
They say London and Paris are beautiful.
translation.es: Dicen que Londres y París son muy bonitos.

translation.en: I've never been anywhere but New York.
translation.es: Solo he estado en Nueva York.
No hay nada mejor que el hogar.

translation.en: My brothers and I sometimes perform together with my father.
translation.es: Mis hermanos y yo a veces tocamos con mi papá.

translation.en: I mean, do you like music?
I bet you sound beautiful when you play together.
translation.es: Seguro suenan muy bien cuando tocan juntos.

translation.en: I hope to see it one day.
I'm not like the other girls.
I'm different from the other girls.
It was the most beautiful thing I have ever heard.
translation.es: Fue lo más bello que he oído.

translation.en: - I'm ready. - Let's go! Come on. Dasia!
I have to practice. What the hell am I supposed to do?
translation.es: Tengo que practicar. No tengo otra opción.

translation.en: - Can I come with you? - Come on!
You know she doesn't have a mother. Just a grandmother and an aunt.
translation.es: Sabes que ella no tiene mamá. Solo una abuela y una tía.

translation.en: My cousin, Moishe Lefkovitch. You remember him.
translation.es: Moishe Lefkovitch, mi primo. ¿Te acuerdas de él?

translation.en: We're here to ask you and your mother that question exactly.
translation.es: Vinimos a preguntarles lo mismo a usted y a su mamá.

translation.en: Now it's my job to keep track of your wife?
translation.es: ¿Ahora tengo que ocuparme de tu esposa?

translation.en: She hasn't been home since yesterday.
translation.es: Desde ayer no volvió a casa.

translation.en: Nobody can find out about this.
- Can we ask your mother a few questions? - No!
You want to scare an old woman?
Her life hasn't been difficult enough?
translation.es: Su vida ha sido muy difícil.

translation.en: It's as she left it when she moved out to get married.
translation.es: Está como lo dejó cuando se mudó al casarse.

translation.en: I am Mordecai Schwartz. This is my daughter.
translation.es: Soy Mordecai Schwartz. Esta es mi hija.

translation.en: We're here to collect the rent.
I have a tour coming up in two weeks, OK? It's two weeks in the Midwest.
translation.es: Tengo una gira dentro de dos semanas en los estados centrales.

translation.en: I'll get paid right after. And then I can pay you the back rent.
translation.es: Cuando me paguen, podré pagarle el alquiler atrasado.

translation.en: And then I'll pay you three months in advance, OK?
translation.es: Le pagaré tres meses por adelantado.

translation.en: Yeah, I'm good for it. I just need two weeks.
translation.es: Sí, le voy a pagar. Solo necesito dos semanas.

translation.en: George? I'll just be one more minute, OK?
- So what? What? - Do you play?

translation.es: A veces, cuando nadie me ve.

translation.en: Anyway, we don't have one at home.
translation.es: En mi casa no hay piano.

translation.en: Why did you send me? Go yourself!
- You're welcome to play here. - I don't know!
translation.es: - Puedes venir a tocar aquí. - ¡No sé!

translation.en: If you want, I could teach you.
Is this your first time in Berlin, Esty?
translation.es: ¿Primera vez que vienes a Berlín, Esty?

translation.en: - Let's go! - Like what? Hitler's bunker?
- It's still there? - No, she's just messing with you.
Or we can take selfies at the memorial to the murdered Jews of Europe.
translation.es: Podemos tomarnos fotos en el monumento a los judíos asesinados.

translation.en: That, Yael, is a superb idea.
And the memorial to the murdered homosexuals is just across the street.
translation.es: Y el monumento a los homosexuales asesinados está enfrente.

translation.en: there's one to the murdered Sinti and Romas nearby, too.
translation.es: también está el de los sintis y romas asesinados.

translation.en: - You don't sound like it. - I've never been anywhere else.
translation.es: - No pareces neoyorquina. - Nunca he ido a otro lugar.

translation.en: Yemen. But I grew up near Munich.
translation.es: De Yemen, pero crecí cerca de Múnich.

translation.en: And I'm from Israel, Ahmed is from Nigeria,
translation.es: Yo soy de Israel, Ahmed es de Nigeria,

translation.en: Clemens... is German, but your parents came from...?
translation.es: Clemens es alemán, pero tus padres son...

translation.en: And Robert is the only one of us who is actually from Berlin.
translation.es: Y Robert es el único que es de Berlín.

translation.en: So he can answer all your burning questions about the war.
translation.es: Él puede responder a tus preguntas sobre la guerra.

translation.en: My grandparents lost their whole families in the camps.
translation.es: Mis abuelos perdieron a su familia en los campos.

translation.en: But we're too busy defending our present to be sentimental about our past.
translation.es: Pero preferimos defender el presente que afligirnos por el pasado.

translation.en: - Yael always talks big, big, big-- - A lot of talking.
Yeah, a lot of talking. But she's never been in military combat.
translation.es: Sí, pero nunca ha estado en un combate militar.

translation.en: She was playing the violin in the military orchestra.
translation.es: Ella tocaba el violín en la orquesta militar.

translation.en: Like Vivaldi's Four Seasons every weekend, madam?
translation.es: ¿Las cuatro estaciones de Vivaldi cada fin de semana?
A veces tocábamos la Novena de Beethoven.

translation.en: Well, at least you have a life.
translation.es: Bueno, al menos tienes una vida.

translation.en: The conference where the Nazis decided to kill the Jews in the concentration camps took place in 1942...
translation.es: Allí los nazis mataron a los judíos en los campos de concentración en 1942...

translation.en: And you swim in this lake?
Well, the lake is just a lake.
translation.es: Bueno, el lago es solo un lago.

translation.en: When the Berlin Wall was up,
translation.es: Cuando estaba el muro de Berlín,

translation.en: East German guards shot anyone who tried to swim across this lake to freedom.
translation.es: desde la RDA le disparaban a cualquiera que intentara atravesar el lago.

translation.en: Now you can swim as far as you like.
You go in. I'll watch everyone's stuff.
You can't just come into my apartment like this!
translation.es: No pueden entrar así a mi apartamento.

translation.en: I've been paying my rent on time!
You know exactly who I'm talking about.
translation.es: Sabe bien a quién me refiero.

translation.en: - Moishe! - Jesus! What is wrong with you people?
She quit the piano lessons for you.
translation.es: Dejó las clases de piano por ti.

translation.en: Tell me where to find her.
- I don't know. - Alright, Ms. Vivian Dropkin.
translation.es: - No sé. - Muy bien, Sra. Vivian Dropkin.

translation.en: If you don't tell us where she is, we'll cut off your electricity.
translation.es: Si no nos dice, le cortaremos la electricidad.

translation.en: And then we'll cancel your lease.
- Ahmed doesn't know any German. - Really?
Yeah, but he thinks he can fake speaking German with just three words.
translation.es: Sí, pero cree que lo puede hablar con solo tres palabras.

translation.en: We have the same words in Yiddish:
I will try that, if I ever go to a dinner party.
translation.es: Las usaré si alguna vez voy a una cena.

translation.en: So you're really going back to practice now? What, so late?
translation.es: ¿De verdad vas a ensayar ahora, tan tarde?

translation.en: The academy is open till midnight.
- I hope to see you around, Esty. - Yeah.
translation.es: - Espero que nos veamos, Esty. - Sí.

translation.en: - Good luck with Dvorak. - Thank you!
Yanky, one thing leads to another.
translation.es: Yanky, una cosa lleva a la otra.

translation.en: You let her take piano lessons with that shiksa, right?
translation.es: Dejaste que tocara piano con esa no judía.

translation.en: Schlomo Moskowitz takes his wife out to bars in Manhattan!
translation.es: Schlomo lleva a su esposa a los bares.

translation.en: I mean, even your clothes? Your phone?
Esty took nothing because it was the Sabbath and the eruv was broken.
translation.es: Esty no se llevó nada porque era el sabbat y el eruv estaba roto.

translation.en: Did you already check her phone for funny numbers?
translation.es: ¿Viste su teléfono a ver si tiene números raros?

translation.en: The doctor's office called about blood test results
translation.es: Ya está el resultado del análisis de sangre.

translation.en: and offered an appointment for an ultrasound next week.
translation.es: Tiene cita para una ecografía la semana entrante.

translation.en: And she didn't even take anything with her!
- That depends how you look at it. - She took the baby!
translation.es: - Eso depende de cómo lo mires. - Se llevó al bebé.

translation.en: Her crazy mother lives in Berlin!
translation.es: Su madre loca vive en Berlín.

translation.en: I thought she came from England?
She came from Manchester to Williamsburg,
but when she left Yanky's father- in- law, she moved to Germany.
translation.es: pero cuando dejó al suegro de Yanky, se mudó a Alemania.

translation.en: We shouldn't have agreed to this marriage.
The apple doesn't fall far from the tree.
translation.es: - De tal palo, tal astilla. - Mimi.

translation.en: The rabbi wants me to go to Berlin?
translation.es: ¿El rabino quiere que yo vaya a Berlín?

translation.en: Life is a never- ending battle between good and evil.
translation.es: La vida es una batalla entre el bien y el mal.
Dios siempre nos pone a prueba.

translation.en: Anyway, the boy can't handle a trip to Berlin on his own.
translation.es: De todos modos, él no debería viajar solo a Berlín.

translation.en: The rabbi wants me to go to Berlin with Yanky?
translation.es: ¿El rabino quiere que yo vaya a Berlín con Yanky?

translation.en: Of course he's going with you, Moishe!

translation.es: Me enteré de que te vas a casar.

translation.en: - I'll be in the kitchen. - No.
I will wait in the kitchen.
You stopped being my mother the day you left Williamsburg.
translation.es: Dejaste de serlo el día que te fuiste de Williamsburg.

translation.en: No. I will always be your mother.
I wanted to give you this.
Proves your right to German citizenship.
translation.es: Tu derecho a la ciudadanía alemana.

translation.en: Because my parents, your grandparents, were born there.
translation.es: Porque mis padres, tus abuelos, nacieron allá.

translation.en: It's just in case you need somewhere else to go.
translation.es: En caso de que debas ir a otro lugar.

translation.en: I'm getting married. Don't you get it?
I'm going to make a family with Yanky Shapiro.
translation.es: Voy a hacer una familia con Yanky Shapiro.

translation.en: Lots of children. A real home.
translation.es: Tendremos muchos hijos y un verdadero hogar.

translation.en: I won't ever need anywhere else to go. This is what I want.
translation.es: No necesitaré ir a otro lugar. Esto es lo que quiero.

translation.en: - OK, you think that now-- - Don't you tell me what I think.
translation.es: - ¿Crees que...? - No me digas lo que pienso.

translation.en: - You don't even know me. - Maybe not.
translation.es: - Ni siquiera me conoces. - Tal vez no.

translation.en: But you keep those documents safe, please.
translation.es: Pero mantén esos documentos a salvo, por favor.

translation.en: Rabbi, I don't know if I'm the right--
translation.es: Rabino, no sé si soy el adecuado.

translation.en: Bring back Esther Shapiro and God will take care of you.
translation.es: Trae a Esther Shapiro y Dios cuidará de ti.

translation.en: Work things out with your wife and children.
translation.es: Arregla las cosas con tu esposa e hijos.

translation.en: The rabbi will do all that for me?
